front.title: Evaluation of Privacy for DNS Private Exchange

abstract.t: The set of DNS requests that an individual makes can provide an attacker with a large amount of information about that individual. DNS Private Exchange (DPRIVE) aims to deprive the attacker of this information. This document describes methods for measuring the performance of DNS privacy mechanisms, particularly it provides methods for measuring effectiveness in the face of pervasive monitoring as defined in RFC7258. The document includes example evaluations for common use cases.
